text: Quillajaceae is a flowering plant including two species, i.e. Q.saponaria and Q.brasiliensis. Formely included in Rosaceous taxa K. Kubitski QuillajaceaeLotova, L. I. and A. C. Timonin. 1999. Anatomy of cortex and secondary phloem in Rosaceae. 3. Quillajoideae. Bot. Zhurn. 84 (2): 34-41 ==References== Category:Fabales Category:Plant families
title: Quillajaceae
